\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
I \&\& {\mathcal C} \&\& I \&\& {\mathcal C} \\
\& {\{\ast\}} \&\&\&\& {\{\ast\}}
\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "F", from=1-1, to=1-3]
\arrow["{\varphi }"', from=1-1, to=2-2]
\arrow[""{name=1, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "F", from=1-5, to=1-7]
\arrow["{\varphi }"', from=1-5, to=2-6]
\arrow["{\varphi _\ast F=\varinjlim F}"'{pos=0.8}, color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,68}, from=2-2, to=1-3]
\arrow["{\varphi _! F = \varprojlim F}"'{pos=0.9}, color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,68}, from=2-6, to=1-7]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,68}, shorten <=3pt, shorten >=3pt, Rightarrow, from=1, to=2-6]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,255;green,51;blue,68}, shorten <=3pt, shorten >=3pt, Rightarrow, from=2-2, to=0]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
